content.text: Match ends, Southampton 3, Burnley 1.
Second Half ends, Southampton 3, Burnley 1.
Foul by Patrick Bamford (Burnley).
James Ward-Prowse (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Dusan Tadic (Southampton) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by James Ward-Prowse with a cross.
